name: js-data-cloud-datastore
description: Google Cloud Datastore adapter for js-data.
author: js-data-cloud-datastore project authors

scripts.bundle: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f cjs -o dist/js-data-cloud-datastore.js -m dist/js-data-cloud-datastore.js.map src/index.js
scripts.lint: semistandard src/index.js mocha.start.js scripts/*.js test/**/*.js rollup.config.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --hook-run-in-context node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 30000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register mocha.start.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.release: npm test && npm run doc && npm run repo-tools
scripts.ci: npm run test && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls || true && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage || true
